alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Duval County through 445 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms about to merge near Fort Caroline, or 7 miles northeast of Arlington, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Arlington, Atlantic Beach, Neptune Beach, Mayport, Talbot Island, Craig Field, San Pablo, Little Talbot Island, Fort Caroline and Tallyrand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
